Articles.Content:
Hello I'm from portugal. *looks around to see if anyone raises head*

I've bought KSP many months ago and by that time I spent a few dozen hours playing, designing ships and trying to make something really big and powerful that would rocket my kerbals into space. Of course I wasn't succefull.

Most of my ships broke apart on launch or had too much weight (had to put throttle really low). The few that did make it into space were soon crashing back on Kerbin. I did manage to make some ships orbit Kerbin, but with little spare fuel. Nonetheless I found the game really entertaining, but had other games to play. Now after all that time I'm back for more KSP adventures! So that's why I decided to join the foums.
Hello Nebur Wolf. There are indeed other players from Portugal, or at least others who speak Portuguese. But you seem to do just fine in English.
